channel.title: Random Events
channel.description:
I have a random event system, that makes an interface pop up, and you have to click the skill and whatnot to continue.
But I have 2 problems.
First of all, the random events pop up like 50% of the time, I tried changing it but it still happens.
Second of all, I want to make it give you skill XP for getting the event, how do I do that? or atleast GP

item.title: Random Events
item.dc:creator: @Mario_PvP Mario PvP
item.description:
@Mario_PvP wrote:

  1. should be coded in the clickingbuttons.java if youâ€™re using PI.
    if you click the skill, there should be shown an ID in your command prompt.
    like that you know your ID for the skills. now you should make something like
    Case ID:
    addexpthing

you get the point?
